message.content: {"id": "14197", "title": "Removing a working set immediately makes changes without confirming", "description": "When removing a working set, the changes are applied immediately without any confirmation prompt.", "OB": "1. Create a working set with one project and select it. 2. Notice that the package view is filtered.", "EB": "Currently, when deleting a working set, the package view in the background is immediately refiltered. In my opinion, the refiltering should only happen when closing the working set selection dialog, not while manipulating it. Additionally, I believe that pressing cancel should cancel all changes made to the working sets, including cancelling the removal of the set.", "SR": ""}
